de.sciss.jcollider
Interface EventManager.Processor

All Known Implementing Classes:
NodeWatcher, NumberField, Server
Enclosing class:
EventManager
public static interface EventManager.Processor

Callers of the EventManager constructor must provide an object implementing this interface

Method Summary
 void processEvent(BasicEvent e)
          Processes the next event in the queue.
 

Method Detail

processEvent

void processEvent(BasicEvent e)
Processes the next event in the queue. This gets called in the event thread. Usually implementing classes should loop through all listeners by calling em.countListeners() and em.getListener(), and invoke specific dispatching methods on these listeners.
